thread.section_title: Three teenagers arrested after baby girl dies in hospital – Metro
thread.title: Three teenagers arrested after baby girl dies in hospital
thread.title_full: Three teenagers arrested after baby girl dies in hospital

author: georgiadiebelius1
title: Three teenagers arrested after baby girl dies in hospital
text:
She died in Royal Preston Hospital (Picture: PA) Three teenagers have been arrested in connection with the death a baby in Preston.
Police were called to a home in Lostock Hall at around 9.30am yesterday to treat a 19-month-old little girl.
Stag caught using his antlers to raid garden bird-feeder and eat nuts She was rushed to Royal Preston Hospital, however died shortly after her arrival.
Officers have revealed that her death is being treated as suspicious.
An 18-year-old girl and two boys aged 18 and 19, have been arrested and remain in police custody.
Police were called to Lostock Hall in Preston (Picture: Google street) A post-mortem is set to be carried out to establish the cause of death.
A spokeswoman for Lancashire Police said: ‘Officers were contacted at shortly after 9.30am on Thursday (March 23) by the ambulance service who were treating a 19 month old baby girl at an address in Lostock Hall.
More: UK Wife who cheated must stay in 'unhappy' marriage 
Van driver repeatedly rams car after stealing fuel 
Three arrested in Manchester in connection with London terror attack 
‘The girl sadly died a short time later at the Royal Preston Hospital.
‘The death is being treated as suspicious and a post mortem examination will be carried out to try to establish the cause.
‘Three people, a woman aged 18 and two men aged 18 and 19, from Lostock Hall have been arrested and are currently in custody.
‘Inquiries are continuing.’
